title: HDFC Bank announces 15% dividend, board approves stock buyback
body: HDFC Bank today declared a 15% dividend for shareholders and the board also approved a stock buyback programme worth Rs 10,000 crore.

title: HDFC Bank board clears buyback, 15% dividend for FY25
body: In a move to reward shareholders, HDFC Bank's board cleared a stock buyback and announced a 15% dividend for the financial year 2025.

title: RBI raises repo rate by 25bps to 6.75%, citing inflation concerns
body: The Reserve Bank of India has raised the key policy rate by 25 basis points to 6.75 percent, highlighting rising inflation as the main risk.

title: Central bank hikes policy rate by 25bps, signals hawkish stance
body: India's central bank decided to increase the policy repo rate by 0.25 percentage points, signalling a hawkish stance against inflation.

title: ICICI Bank opens 500 new branches across Tier-2 cities
body: ICICI Bank announced the opening of 500 new branches across Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities to expand its retail presence.

title: Banking sector NPAs decline to 5-year low, credit growth at 16%
body: Non-performing assets in the banking sector fell to a five-year low while credit growth accelerated to 16 percent, according to RBI data.

title: NPAs hit 5-year low as banks clean up books; credit growth robust
body: Indian banks have cleaned up their balance sheets, bringing NPAs to a five-year low even as credit growth remains robust at around 16%.

title: Infosys signs $2 billion AI and cloud deal with US retailer
body: Infosys has signed a multi-year $2 billion AI and cloud services deal with a large US-based retail chain, boosting its order book.
